div.div: Monthly variation at the population and individual levels in mass-independent BMR, M SUMand ME.
div.p: Population data (black line and dots) are least square means for BMR (A), M SUM (B) and ME (C) controlling for year, month, sex, body mass and bird ID as random parameter. In B and C - dotted line, open dots and uppercase: 1 st year; solid line, black dots and lowercase: 2 nd year. Different letters represent significant difference between months within a year. Predicted values calculated from LMEs (see text for details) are used to visualize data from individuals captured more than once (grey lines).
